name: Doodle's Drool Drop Dream
description:
As Doodle the cat dreams of tuna and yarn, her own drool disturbs her spacy slumber.  Collect the items Doodle likes and avoid the water drops to keep on sleeping!  But be careful... The longer you play the faster the dream!

Use the arrow keys to move left and right.  This game is very simple yet addicting! Doodle herself finds it too short, but she's kind of a drama queen...  Sometimes dumb games can be fun too, right?  Even if not, don't knock it 'til you try it!  It's free!!

• Simple controls and a simple goal

• Easy to play hyper-casual game

• Fun for all ages

• There's a cat

• IT'S FREE

Game by wallflowerwolf (my first so go easy!) with special thanks to support staff Calypso (Doodle) and Mini! More (and much better) kitty adventures to come! Donating will help me get to my goals and is much appreciated :)
